column5: Hello all! I was just wondering how safe it is to eat fish from the grand river in the brantford area?
This link  Guide to eating Ontario sport fish   might help answer your questions.
Should be ok to eat in reasonable amounts lol.
There's a tavern in Paris that had a sign above the can, "Please Flush, Brantford Needs The Water"  Just say'n
Don't eat the big ones, and eat in moderation and you will be fine.
Exactly.  Larger fish always have higher levels of toxins in them.
